title: What is information communication technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology that enables you to create, modify and view information, and technology that enables people and "things" to communicate. A spreadsheet [on a computer ] is an example of the first. Email is an example of the second. At one time , spreadsheets were on paper(!). At one time, people in large organisations would send each other [paper] memos; you would get internal mail once or twice a day. The rest of the time, you were free to actually work!

It’s a way to fuse Information Technology (IT) and Communications as a broader subject, mostly for policy or economic studies purposes. There are several commonalities, as you need communications for interconnecting computers, and communication equipment are essentally special purpose computers.
